rows.hard_exit_criteria: Rust->Zig and Zig->Rust proof interoperability green for pinned commit; full module parity vectors and negative cases; no unresolved divergence records
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: full prover pipeline (trace -> composition -> PCS/FRI -> proof), verifier parity paths, proof wire compatibility, transcript/channel compatibility, hash/VCS parity, and PoW/config parity.

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Differential tests against Rust constraint outputs for fixed seeds/traces; all edge/failure tests green
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: quotient/evaluator edge semantics and broadened law/property coverage for expression rewrites used by prover paths.

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Rust parity vectors for AIR utilities and composition checkpoints; full integration tests with proof generation and verification
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: expanded trace helper surface plus deeper AIR composition plumbing in non-example prover paths.

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Compile-time generated outputs parity-tested against Rust expectations; no manual per-AIR boilerplate required beyond declared conformance limit
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: derive-like helpers for upstream patterns beyond component adapters and lookup row helpers.
rows.zig_target_area: Zig compile-time generation layer (comptime helpers/macros equivalent)

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Every selected Rust example has Zig equivalent and bidirectional verification with semantic tamper rejection
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: deterministic bidirectional interop and tamper coverage for `xor`, `state_machine`, `wide_fibonacci`, `plonk`, `poseidon`, and `blake`.

rows.hard_exit_criteria: Freestanding verifier build passes conformance test matrix; behavior matches standard build for identical inputs
rows.remaining_required_scope: Delivered and evidence-gated: behavior-parity coverage between standard verifier and freestanding profile across the checkpoint fixture matrix.
rows.zig_target_area: freestanding/minimal Zig verifier profile and build flags
